workgroup_id.name: workgroup_id
workgroup_id.description: identifier used to lookup the workgroup
workgroup_id.validation_error_text: Parameter workgroup_id only accepts integer numbers.

user_id.name: user_id
user_id.description: identifier used to lookup the user
user_id.validation_error_text: Parameter user_id only accepts integer numbers.

role.name: role
role.description: role of user in the workgroup
role.validation_error_text: Parameter role only accepts printable characters and spaces, including newlines. This excludes control characters.

name: add_workgroup_user
description: add_workgroup_user adds a user from the specified workgroup
